result.name: western-anglerfish-and-hake-2007-08-fisheries-science-partnership
result.notes:
One of ten beam trawl surveys to investigate catches of anglerfish and hake 
(*Merluccius**merluccius*) in the Celtic Sea and Western Approaches, and 
to examine bycatches of other species. To investigate the effectiveness of an 
"environmental panel" designed for reducing the bycatch of organisms and 
debris.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Western anglerfish and hake 2007/08 - Fisheries Science Partnership
